briefDescription: Defines all vectors from size 2-4, and all matrixes from size 2x2 to 4x4, of the given type, as [[dimensional_array]]s.
detailedDescription:
Defines all vectors from size 2-4, and all matrixes from size 2x2 to 4x4, of the given type, as [[dimensional_array]]s.
These vectors and matrixes are named [type][size], like float2 and float3x4.
